name: Name Age Gender
description:
CONTROLS:

Control with mouse, click on the black, bold writing to progress in the story. 

This is a private entry to the 2021 Game Jam by the bpb. The topic: Gender-Mainstreaming, Trans-Identität, (Anti-)Feminismus, Gender-Repräsentationen in Games, Intersektionalität, Queerness 

Or basically: I made a game about someone who is non-binary dealing with intrusive questions... by the player.
